title: CSP.guru
description: A database of concentrating solar power plants of the world for energy modellers and analysts.
long_description:
This datasets holds technical, economic, financial, and industrial data on all operating concentrating solar power stations and of stations under construction (larger than 10 MW). For detailed description of the data collection procedure, please see the original article [Lilliestam et al. (2017)](https://doi.org/10.1038/nenergy.2017.94).

## Data Package

We provide the data in form of a [tabular data package](https://frictionlessdata.io/specs/tabular-data-package/) that consists of a CSV (comma separated values) file holding the actual data and a single JSON file (`datapackage.json`) holding the metadata.

## License and conditions

The licence of this data allows academic and all non-commercial use if you give appropriate credit, under the [Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International license](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/).

For academic and professional use (presentations, journal articles, reports, etc):
Please cite the original source, the paper [Lilliestam et al. (2017)](https://doi.org/10.1038/nenergy.2017.94). Please also link to https://www.csp.guru if possible.

## Contact

For questions or issues get in touch with [Johan Lilliestam](mailto:johan.lilliestam@usys.ethz.ch) or [Richard Thonig](mailto:richard.thonig@usys.ethz.ch).
## Acknowledgements
Funding for the 2016-08-30 version of this work came from a European Research Council Consolidator Grant [DESERTECTION (grant number 313553)](https://cordis.europa.eu/project/rcn/106709_de.html), version 2018-05-14 received support from the European Union Horizon 2020 research and innovation program [MUSTEC (grant agreement No 764626) ](https://cordis.europa.eu/project/rcn/211264_en.html) .

## Archive

All versions of the CSP.guru dataset are archived at [Zenodo](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.1318151).

fields.name: Power_station
fields.description: name of the CSP plant

fields.name: Year_operational
fields.description: indicates the year of the first power output

fields.name: Status
fields.description: distinguishes if a CSP plant is operational or under construction

fields.name: Country
fields.description: country where the CSP plant is located

fields.name: City
fields.description: nearest city or municipality to the CSP plant site

fields.name: Lat
fields.description: latitude of the plant

fields.name: Lon
fields.description: longitude of the plant

fields.name: DNI_[kWh/m2/yr]
fields.description: direct normal irradiance (DNI) [kWh/m²/yr], indicates the solar resource

fields.name: Construction_start
fields.description: indicates the year when construction started

fields.name: Technology
fields.description: distinguishes CSP technologies: Trough, Tower, Hybrid, Fresnel

fields.name: Capacity_[MW]
fields.description: nominal capacity of the turbine [MW]

fields.name: Storage_capacity_[h]
fields.description: hours the turbine can run on full load using stored heat alone [hours]

fields.name: Field_size_[m2]
fields.description: the mirror area [㎡]

fields.name: Cooling
fields.description: cooling technology: dry, wet, or hybrid

fields.name: Expected_generation_[GWh/yr]
fields.description: expected yearly power output [GWh/year]

fields.name: Load_factor
fields.description: actual yearly generation divided by maximum possible yearly generation

fields.name: Total_cost_[million_currency;non-deflated]
fields.description: construction cost in million local currency, non-deflated

fields.name: Total_cost_[million_USD;non-deflated]
fields.description: construction cost converted to million US Dollar, non-deflated

fields.name: Total_cost_[million_USD2017;deflated]
fields.description: construction cost in million US Dollar, deflated from Year_operational using the Worldbank's GDP deflator; if station under development or constrution then deflated from 2017

fields.name: Specific_investment_cost_[USD2017/kW;deflated]
fields.description: investment cost per MW [2017 USD], deflated from Year_operational using the Worldbank's GDP deflator; if station under development or constrution then deflated from 2017

fields.name: Total_cost_[million_Euro;non-deflated]
fields.description: construction cost in million Euro, non-deflated

fields.name: Total_cost_[million_Euro2017;deflated]
fields.description: construction cost in million Euro, deflated from Year_operational using the Worldbank's GDP deflator; if station under development or constrution then deflated from 2017

fields.name: Specific_investment_cost_[Euro2017/kW;deflated]
fields.description: investment cost per kW [2017 Euro], deflated from Year_operational using the Worldbank's GDP deflator; if station under development or constrution then deflated from 2017

fields.name: Developer
fields.description: company that developed the project

fields.name: EPC
fields.description: company responsible for engineering, procurement and construction of the CSP plant

fields.name: HCE_manufacturer
fields.description: heat collecting element (HCE) manufacturer

fields.name: SCA_manufacturer
fields.description: solar collector assemblies (SCA) manufacturer

fields.name: Financed_through
fields.description: how the owner makes money from the generated electricity: power purchase agreement (PPA), feed-in tariff (FIT), spot market sales

fields.name: Remuneration_[currency/kWh]
fields.description: indicates the level of FIT or PPA in [currency/kWh], local currency

fields.name: Remuneration_[USD/kWh;non_deflated]
fields.description: indicates the level of FIT or PPA in [USD/kWh], non-deflated

fields.name: Remuneration_[USD2017/kWh;deflated]
fields.description: indicates the level of FIT or PPA in [USD2017/kWh], deflated from Year_operational using the Worldbank's GDP deflator; if station under development or constrution then deflated from 2017

fields.name: Remuneration_[Euro/kWh;non_deflated]
fields.description: indicates the level of FIT or PPA in [Euro/kWh], non-deflated

fields.name: Remuneration_[Euro2017/kWh;deflated]
fields.description: indicates the level of FIT or PPA in [Euro2017/kWh], deflated from Year_operational using the Worldbank's GDP deflator; if station under development or constrution then deflated from 2017

fields.name: LCOE_5_25_[USD2017/kWh]
fields.description: levelised cost of electricity with 5% weighted average cost of capital [USD2017/kWh] and a 25 year payback period, cap dependent O&M, deflated from Year_operational using the Worldbank's GDP deflator; if station under development or constrution then deflated from 2017

fields.name: LCOE_10_25_[USD2017/kWh]
fields.description: levelised cost of electricity with 10% weighted average cost of capital [USD2017/kWh] and a 25 year payback period, cap dependent O&M, deflated from Year_operational using the Worldbank's GDP deflator; if station under development or constrution then deflated from 2017

fields.name: LCOE_5_25_[Euro2017/kWh]
fields.description: levelised cost of electricity with 5% weighted average cost of capital [Euro2017/kWh] and a 25 year payback period, deflated from Year_operational using the Worldbank's GDP deflator; if station under development or constrution then deflated from 2017

fields.name: LCOE_10_25_[Euro2017/kWh]
fields.description: levelised cost of electricity with 10% weighted average cost of capital [Euro2017/kWh] and a 25 year payback period, deflated from Year_operational using the Worldbank's GDP deflator; if station under development or constrution then deflated from 2017

fields.name: Concessional_funding;other_support
fields.description: financial assistance to project developer: tax credits, soft loans, etc.

fields.name: Owner
fields.description: owner of the CSP plant

fields.name: PPA_or_support_duration_[yr]
fields.description: duration of PPA, FIT, etc. [years]

fields.name: Sources
fields.description: indicates where the information on each plant was retrieved from, Lilliestam et al 2017: Nature energy; indicates the 2016-08-30 version of the CSP.guru dataset
